author: nd
msg: make sure, the preferred language gets its chance, even when it's not

author: randyk
msg: - don't use APR_INLINE, so functions will be added to libapreq.lib.
- temporary workaround until the proper form of APREQ_DECLARE can

author: randyk
msg: For Win32, expand list of drives to search for an Apache.exe (shouldn't
start with 'A' or 'B', as if there's no disc in the drive, a popup box
prompts you to put one in).

author: randyk
msg: - don't change things if users set $ENV{APACHE} or use -httpd
- if neither of these are set, try to find a suitable Apache.exe,
and if found, use this to populate -httpd in @ARGV for Makefile.PL
